Headline: 36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at State/Division

Headline: Howard- bound Red Line Service Delayed at 47th
ShortDescription: Howard- bound Red Line trains are standing at 47th due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard- bound Red Line trains are standing at 47th due to a door problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
